About

Me

My name is Michał and I am currently studying Social Informatics at AGH University of Science and Technology, where I am able to develop skills connected with UX design, data analysis and front end through creating many academic projects. During this year's summer break I would like to get a first experience in IT work to get to know how it really works in practice and further develop my skills in more orderly manner.

In my spare time I like to play piano, swim and watch psychological movies with unconventional endings.
